attributes.description: This dashboard shows Vulnerabilities collected by the Flashpoint Integration.

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides centralized visibility into vulnerability intelligence from Flashpoint, helping teams quickly assess risk and exposure.

It features tables for Top Classifications, Top Vulnerability Names, Top Products, and Top Vendors, along with a metric showing Total Vulnerabilities and Total Exploits. Pie charts visualize Vulnerabilities by Ransomware Scores, Severities, and Status, while a area chart tracks Vulnerabilities by Severity over Time.

A control panel for Status, Severity and Ransomware Score enables focused analysis, and saved searches for Essential CVSS v2, v3, and v4 Details provide deeper scoring insights. Together, these visuals support effective vulnerability prioritization and trend analysis.

**[Integration Page](/app/integrations/detail/ti_flashpoint)**

attributes.title: [Logs Flashpoint] Vulnerabilities
